data.title: SEIBU 1Day Pass / SEIBU 1Day Pass + Nagatoro
data.meta_description: Information about SEIBU 1Day Pass  /  SEIBU 1Day Pass + Nagatoro is provided. Take the SEIBU RAILWAY and COME SEE SEIBU!
data.text:
SEIBU 1Day Pass

Recommended users

We recommend this pass for those who want to fully enjoy the Seibu lines!

Applicable lines/segments

All Seibu lines (Excluding the Tamagawa Line)

Day(s) of use

SEIBU 1Day Pass valid only for the date of purchase

Price

SEIBU 1Day Pass ￥1,000（adult）、￥500（child）

Is it possible to ride Limited Express trains?

Yes, but need extra Limited Express Fare

How to Use

Please pass through an automatic ticket gate on a Seibu line.

Ticket Office Information

Buy tickets before coming to Japan（PDFを開く）

Eligibility for use

Foreigner with non-Japanese passport

Please show all member’s passports, resident cards or SPC emi Cards when purchase.

Refund

SEIBU 1Day Pass + Nagatoro

Recommended users

We recommend this pass for those who want to fully enjoy the Seibu lines and Chichibu!

Applicable lines/segments

Day(s) of use

SEIBU 1Day Pass + Nagatoro valid only for the date of purchase

Price

SEIBU 1Day Pass + Nagatoro ￥1,500（adult）、￥750（child）

Is it possible to ride Limited Express trains?

Yes, but need extra Limited Express Fare

How to Use

Please pass through an automatic ticket gate on a Seibu line. Please show your pass to a station staff on the Chichibu Railway Line.

Ticket Office Information

Buy tickets before coming to Japan（PDFを開く）

Eligibility for use

Foreigner with non-Japanese passport

Please show one of your passport, resident card or SPC emi Card when purchase

Refund
